org.apache.mahout.math.hadoop.stats

Class BasicStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.math.hadoop.stats.BasicStats

  • public final class BasicStats
extends Object
    Methods for calculating basic stats (mean, variance, stdDev, etc.) in map/reduce
